org.apache.logging.log4j.core.util

Class StringEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.util.StringEncoder

  • public final class StringEncoder
extends Object
    Encodes Strings to bytes.
    Since:
    2.5
